name: CINEVEO - VR Cinema
description: CINEVEO is a super immersive VR Cinema experience, with the most detailed and beautifully designed VR Cinema environments on the market. Experience total presence in VR, as you watch your videos inside a collection of ultra-realistic VR Cinemas with AAA graphics and powerful features.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 3 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: Any
